definition: mass/involving everyone/united/lit. to assemble the multitude
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives

pinyin: Mei3 li4 jian1 He2 zhong4 guo2

sentences.english: Never forget your best friends in America.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要忘记你在美利坚合众国的好伴侣。

sentences.english: Markets will rise and fall, but this is the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 市场有起有伏，但这里是美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: The only suchcountry is the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 唯一这样的国度就是美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: God bless you. And may God bless the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 天主保佑你们，怨亓保佑美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: I am a United States of America Air Force Lieutenant Colonel.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个美利坚合众国空军陆军中尉上校。

sentences.english: Psychopath kidnaps and kills young women across the Midwest of America.
sentences.chinese: 精神病患者绑架和杀害的年轻妇女在中西部合众国。

sentences.english: Welcome to the United States of America. Hwan-ying.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎各位来到美利坚合众国，欢迎。

sentences.english: The combination of the 50 states form the united state of america.
sentences.chinese: 五十个州结为一体组成了美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: Thank you. God bless you. And God bless the United States of America
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，愿上帝保祐你们，保祐美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: Markets will rise and fingl! but this is the United Stconsumeds ofAmerica.
sentences.chinese: 市场有起有伏，但这里是美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: 'Markets will rise and fall, but this is the United States of America, ' Mr. Obama said.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马说，市场会起起落落，不过这是美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: In America, they had the Constitution prior to the establishment of the USA.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们是先有宪法，再有美利坚合众国的建立。

sentences.english: It was fought between the United States of America and the Empire of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 该战役在美利坚合众国与日本帝国之间打响。

sentences.english: And God ble the United States of America.
sentences.chinese: 上帝保佑美利坚合众国。

sentences.english: Washington seems incapable of fixing Bmerica's deeper problems.
sentences.chinese: 华府看似无力解决美利坚合众国深条理疑难题目。

sentences.english: Michigan was admitted to the united states in 1837, as the twenty-sixth state .
sentences.chinese: 密执安是一八三七年作为第二十六个州加入合众国的。
